title: Valentine single-page prompt with evasive No and meme reveal

requirements.summary: Create a single-screen, centered Valentine prompt UI in English with a romantic pink/white theme optimized for iPad Chrome.
acceptanceCriteria: App loads to a single screen with one clear question asking to be the author’s Valentine (English text).
Visual styling is consistently pink/white and romantic-themed.
Layout is responsive and usable on iPad Chrome in both portrait and landscape (no horizontal scrolling).

file_operations.description: Implement the single-page centered Valentine prompt layout (question + action area) using Tailwind for a pink/white romantic theme; keep it as the only visible view on initial load. Use the shadcn-ui component library (e.g., Button) to provide consistent, accessible button styling—verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add global styling entry point for Tailwind and app-wide pink/white romantic defaults (background, typography, safe area spacing) to ensure iPad-friendly responsiveness without horizontal scrolling.

requirements.summary: Show “Yes” and “No” options and make “No” evasive on hover and touch so it is effectively not clickable while staying visible on-screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Both “Yes” and “No” controls are visible on initial load.
On pointer hover/enter over “No”, the “No” control relocates to a different position within the visible viewport/container.
On touch devices (iPad), attempting to tap “No” causes it to move away (e.g., on touchstart/pointerdown), preventing a successful click.
The “No” control never moves off-screen; it remains visible but evasive.

file_operations.description: Add an interactive action area containing “Yes” and an evasive “No”; implement pointer/touch handlers (e.g., onPointerEnter/onPointerDown) to reposition “No” within a bounded container so it stays visible but avoids successful interaction. Use shadcn-ui Button (or equivalent from the library) for the controls—verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: On “Yes” selection, transition to a reveal state that shows a meme image and the exact message “That’s the best decision you’ve ever made❤️”.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping “Yes” transitions the UI to a new state without requiring page reload.
The reveal state shows the meme image and the exact text: “That’s the best decision you’ve ever made❤️”.
The original “Yes/No” options are no longer shown after the “Yes” selection.

file_operations.description: Implement a local UI state toggle (prompt -> reveal) when “Yes” is clicked/tapped; replace the prompt/options with a reveal view that renders the exact message text and displays the meme image from static assets. If using shadcn-ui for layout primitives (e.g., Card), verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add the required generated meme image under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the reveal state with responsive scaling.
acceptanceCriteria: The generated image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-meme.dim_1200x1200.png.
The frontend loads and displays the image from static assets (not via backend).
Image scales appropriately on iPad and smaller screens (no overflow/cropping of the message).

file_operations.description: Add the generated square meme image asset exactly at this path for static serving.

Wire the reveal state to render the static image from frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-meme.dim_1200x1200.png with responsive sizing constraints so it fits on iPad and smaller screens without overflow or cropping.
